section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:LinkedQueue< T >
Lightweight, interrupt-safe linked queue MemoryStats
Memory tracking statistics MsgDataPool
Memory pool for efficient MsgData allocation Scheduler::MsgNodeMutex
Mutex for cooperative task synchronization LinkedQueue< T >::Node
Node structure for linked list Scheduler::QueuedMessageResetInfo
System reset information Scheduler
Core scheduler and task manager for FsmOS Semaphore
Semaphore for resource counting and synchronization SharedMsg
Smart pointer-like wrapper for MsgData with reference counting SystemMemoryInfo
System memory information Task
Base class for all tasks in FsmOS TaskMemoryInfo
Task memory information TaskNode
Node structure for Task linked list TaskStats
Task execution statistics
